item.title: Everything Is A File
item.description: Table of contents What is a file? Is my red blue for you, or my green your green, too? What types of files are there? Why should I care? What is a file? Link to heading Files, everything is a file! You may have heard this phrase in relation to Linux. It’s quite popular among Linux enthusiasts, but beyond being a catchy sentence, what does it actually mean? To understand this, we first need to define what a file is at its core.
